message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you. While I cannot disclose the exact details without a confidentiality agreement, I can assure you that it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $1500000.  This is a price that reflects the potential value I see in this product, but I am confident it holds even greater potential in the right hands. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
